statements: SELECT * FROM player_registrations;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM player_registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM player_registrations WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT player_id, email FROM player_registrations WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_registrations ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_registrations WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_registrations WHERE email NOT LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT registration_date, player_name FROM player_registrations WHERE registration_date >= '2021-08-01' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_registrations WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email_address, registration_date FROM player_registrations;
SELECT player_name, email_address, registration_date FROM player_registrations WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_registrations WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM player_registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date, prize_pool FROM tournament_schedules WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_name, email_address FROM player_registrations WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, email_address FROM player_registrations WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT tournament_name, prize_pool FROM tournament_schedules WHERE prize_pool > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, email_address, registration_date FROM player_registrations ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tournament_schedules WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_date FROM Tournaments WHERE registration_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM Players ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT tournament_name FROM Tournaments WHERE tournament_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT player_name, registration_status FROM Players JOIN PlayerTournamentRegistration ON Players.player_id = PlayerTournamentRegistration.player_id WHERE tournament_id = '12345678-1234-5678-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM Players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT tournament_name, tournament_date FROM Tournaments WHERE registration_deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, tournament_id, registration_status FROM PlayerTournamentRegistration WHERE registration_status = 'approved';
SELECT player_name, tournament_name FROM Players INNER JOIN Tournaments ON Players.player_id = Tournaments.tournament_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email, date_registered FROM player_registration;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, tournament_id, registration_date FROM player_tournament ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT tournament_id, game_name, start_time, end_time FROM tournament_schedule WHERE end_time > '15:00:00';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_registration WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_registration WHERE date_registered > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_registration WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournament WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';

SELECT player_name, email, tournament_name, registration_date FROM player_registration JOIN player_tournament ON player_registration.player_id = player_tournament.player_id JOIN tournament ON player_tournament.tournament_id = tournament.tournament_id;
SELECT tournament_name, game_name, start_time, end_time FROM tournament_schedule WHERE tournament_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, matches_played, matches_won, matches_lost FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id;

SELECT player_name, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM players JOIN player_tournaments ON players.player_id = player_tournaments.player_id JOIN tournaments ON player_tournaments.tournament_id = tournaments.tournament_id;

SELECT player_name, matches.match_date, players.player_id AS winner_id, matches_loser.player_id AS loser_id FROM players JOIN matches ON players.player_id = matches.winner_id JOIN players AS matches_loser ON matches.loser_id = matches_loser.player_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT tournament_id, tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM tournaments WHERE end_date < NOW();
SELECT player_id, player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_matches_played FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_matches_played > 10;

SELECT matches.match_id, player1.player_name AS winner_name, player2.player_name AS loser_name FROM matches JOIN players AS player1 ON matches.winner_id = player1.player_id JOIN players AS player2 ON matches.loser_id = player2.player_id WHERE matches.match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
